document_data.caption: A map showing the Hazur Mountains west of the Black Jungles.
document_data.name: Hazur Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hazur Mountains''' were a small mountain range found on the [[Chultan Peninsula]] of [[southwest Faer√ªn]] that served as the border between [[Tashalar]] and [[Thindol]].
document_data.Geography: The Hazur Mountains bordered the [[Shining Sea]] in the north and curved south for approximately {{SI|200|mi|k|long=yes}} before reaching the coast of the [[Great Sea]]. The [[Dolsel Gap]] and [[River Dolsel]] split the mountain range in its southern tip.
